programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: The Big Hit, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Lou Diamond Phillips, Mark Wahlberg, Christina Applegate, Antonio Sabato Jr. and Lela Rochon star in this story of a hitman who kidnaps the teenage child of his boss.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Eight kidnapped women. All beautiful. All talented. All in danger of having their lives cut cruelly short if police detective Alex Cross and key witness Kate McTiernan can’t locate the elusive “collector” who calls himself Casanova.

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The isolated inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by the overwhelming numbers of a seemingly unstoppable street gang.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Barking Dogs Never Bite, (2010, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In Bong Joon-ho's directorial debut, a couple is driven to distraction by a yapping dog located in their apartment complex. Determined to relieve their annoyance, they take extreme action against his tormentor.

programme.title: Southland Tales, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: SOUTHLAND TALES is an ensemble piece set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, as it stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is an action star who's stricken with amnesia.

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: Ang Lee directs the film about private Billy Lynn who is brought home for a victory tour after becoming a hero following an Iraq battle.

programme.title: Cecil B. DeMented, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: Guerrilla moviemakers kidnap a movie goddess (Melanie Griffith) and force her to star in their underground movie

programme.title: Clue, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: Meet all the notorious suspects and discover all their foul play things. You'll love their dastardly doings as the bodies and the laughs pile up before your eyes. Featuring all three surprise endings!!

programme.title: Jawbreaker, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or they’ll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindy’s addicted to tattling, and Jan’s hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman he’s wanted all along!

programme.title: The End, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: The Hospital, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: Paddy Chayefsky’s magnificently dark comedy, directed by Arthur Hiller, stars George C. Scott as the Head of Medicine at a hospital where, over one night, everything falls apart. Diana Rigg also stars as the free spirit who arrives just in time.

programme.title: Up in Smoke, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Cooley High, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Set in 1964 Chicago, "Cooley High" is a slice-of-life tale of two high school students--best friends--coping with the challenges of everyday life and growing up in the shadows of the housing projects. Glynn Turman and Laurence-Hilton Jacobs star.

programme.title: Up in Smoke, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong make their film debut in this riotous rock'n'roll comedy, bringing with them the same madness, lifestyles and sketches that sold over 10 million records in the early 1970s.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Téa squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: One down, two to go! With the loss of Tristan, Serenity is heartbroken. Can she pull herself together and remember the lessons Tristan taught her to turn the duel around?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tristan's back... but he's not who he appears to be when he kidnaps Mokuba! It's time for Kaiba to stop monkeying around and rescue his brother, but he's confronted by Big 5 Leichter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 5's Satellite Cannon attacks Kaiba's monsters from deep space! Mokuba's unwavering faith in Kaiba inspires him to believe that his brother will pull out the victory, but Noah has plans to ruin their brotherhood...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba arrives at Noah's sanctuary to rescue Mokuba, but Mokuba wants to stay with Noah! Has Mokuba seen the evil within Kaiba, or is something more sinister in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah gives the Big Five one last chance to redeem themselves in a five-on-two tag team duel where Yugi and Joey take on the entire Big Five!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?
programme.sub-title: Merger of the Big Five, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami – who’s on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Nami’s loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing’s for sure – no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Nami’s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami’s treasure, but who’s he working for? More importantly, who’s Nami working for, and what’s she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: The Straw Hats’ faith in Nami is restored, and now it’s time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlong’s fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami – and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Nami’s former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. He’s so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!

programme.title: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffy’s face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town – the final resting place of Gold Roger!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!

programme.title: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the island’s caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!

programme.title: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captain’s place. While they’re busy beating each other’s brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!

programme.title: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!

programme.title: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooter’s goggles, but they lead to a run-in with Daddy the Parent – the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!

programme.title: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanji’s dreams of the legendary All Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji vs. the Beautiful Chef!

programme.title: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Buggy's Revenge! The Man Who Smiles On the Execution Platform!

programme.title: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!

programme.title: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned lifeboat interrupts Luffy and his crew’s voyage to the Grand Line.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!

programme.title: After escaping the clutches of the Marine fleet, the Straw Hats soon find themselves in an equally dangerous predicament – stranded in the Calm Belt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miraculous Creature! Apis's Secret and The Legendary Island!

programme.title: The Straw Hats want to return Apis’s dragon to his nest, but the Marines have them surrounded. Looks like it’s time for another daring escape!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eric Attacks! Great Escape from Warship Island!

programme.title: Even for Nami, finding the dragon’s lost island proves to be tougher than looking for a needle in a haystack – or at the bottom of the ocean.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Solitary Island in the Distant Sea! The Legendary Lost Island!

programme.title: Nami discovers a map to the true location of the dragon’s nest, and Zorro puts his steel to the test against Eric the Whirlwind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Ruins! Tense Zoro vs. Eric!

programme.title: The Straw Hats sail headfirst into Commodore Nelson and his Marine armada. While Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro dodge cannon balls, Eric the Whirlwind prepares a sneak attack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy, Completely Surrounded! Commodore Nelson's Secret Strategy!

programme.title: With their rescue mission taking on water, the Straw Hats get some surprising help from the great blue yonder.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Through the Sky They Soar! The 1000 Year Legend Lives Again!

programme.title: After unlocking the secrets of the dragon’s nest, Luffy does battle with Eric the Whirlwind to ensure the safety of the island. Don’t mess with the rubberman!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Showdown! Cross the Red Line!

programme.title: The Straw Hat crew takes a wild ride up and down a mountain only to end up in the belly of a giant whale that’s on the lookout for pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Line of Defense? The Giant Whale Laboon Appears!

programme.title: Luffy trades blows with Laboon the whale, and Nami is distressed to learn that navigating the Grand Line is no easy feat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Promise Between Men! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away… and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award® Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Navajo Joe, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds, Aldo Sambrell and Fernando Rey star in this lusty, gutsy action western about a fearless Indian with a relentless vendetta against the band of outlaws that killed his people. Directed by Spaghetti Western legend Sergio Corbucci.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: Blood On The Arrow, (1964, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Arizona, an escaped outlaw survives an Indian attack and helps a trading-post family retrieve their kidnapped son from marauding Apaches.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Clerks II, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons, but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire. Sequel to the 1994 film by Kevin Smith.

programme.title: Clerks III, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a massive heart attack, Randal enlists his friends and fellow clerks Dante, Elias, Jay, and Silent Bob to make a movie immortalizing his life at the convenience store that started it all.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Cloud Atlas (2012)
programme.desc: With the consequences of their actions, individuals impact one anothers lives throughout the past, present and future.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: The Saint (1997)
programme.desc: A clever thief who is known as the master of creating false identities using the names of Catholic saints, is hired by the Russian Mafia for his next mission. But things get complicated when he falls for Emma Russel, the scientist.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: Hostage (2005)
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.

programme.title: Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: First Blood (1982)
programme.desc: Green Beret veteran Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) takes on a Pacific Northwest sheriff (Brian Dennehy) and the National Guard.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II (1985)
programme.desc: A former Green Beret (Sylvester Stallone) goes on a reconnaissance mission to spring MIAs from a Viet Cong prison.

programme.title: Rambo III (1988)
programme.desc: Former Special Forces agent John Rambo blasts through Soviet-occupied Afghanistan in search of his captive mentor.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)
programme.desc: Sergio Leones portrait of the friendships, loyalties and betrayals among Jewish gangsters in the 1920s and 30s.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West (1968)
programme.sub-title: Once Upon a Time in the West (1968)
programme.desc: An outlaw (Henry Fonda) working for a railroad magnate fights a stranger (Charles Bronson) for a New Orleans widows (Claudia Cardinale) land.

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon (1975)
programme.desc: A man robs a bank to pay for his lovers operation. It turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone (1990)
programme.sub-title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone (1990)
programme.desc: Dignified Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) joins his wild nephew in a Sicilian vendetta involving the Vatican.

programme.title: A Perfect Day (2015)
programme.desc: Aid workers (Benicio del Toro, Tim Robbins, Olga Kurylenko) in the Balkans try to retrieve a mans body from a well before it contaminates the water for nearby villagers.

programme.title: The House With a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
programme.sub-title: The House With a Clock in Its Walls (2018)
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Lewis goes to live with his uncle in a creaky old house that contains a mysterious ticktock noise. When Lewis accidentally awakens the dead, the towns sleepy facade magically springs to life with a secret world of witches and warlocks.

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness (1996)
programme.desc: An Irish engineer (Val Kilmer) and a U.S. hunter (Michael Douglas) stalk two lions decimating a construction crew in East Africa.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: Recurring nightmares of the planet Mars lead a confused earthling into the center of an intergalactic conspiracy.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.

programme.title: Panama (2022)
programme.desc: A defense contractor hires an ex-marine to go to Panama to complete an arms deal. In the process, he becomes involved in the U.S. invasion of Panama.

programme.title: Good Kill (2014)
programme.desc: An Air Force drone pilot (Ethan Hawke) begins to question the ethics of dropping bombs on Afghanistan from the safety of his post in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hide and Seek (2021)
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman follows a lead to find his missing brother, he dives headlong into a twisted underworld of squatters and vagrants that threatens to tear apart his family as he struggles to maintain his sanity.

programme.title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon (2021)
programme.sub-title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon (2021)
programme.desc: When a struggling single mother befriends a mysterious woman who has supernatural powers, she sees a lucrative opportunity to make some fast cash. However, their crime spree soon draws unwanted attention as the cops start to close in.

programme.title: The Fifth Estate (2013)
programme.desc: WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange (Benedict Cumberbatch) and his colleague, Daniel Domscheit-Berg (Daniel Bruhl), provide a platform for whistle-blowers to leak covert data anonymously and expose government secrets and corporate crimes.

programme.title: Marathon Man (1976)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Dead Shot (2023)
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, an ex-paramilitary soldier witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by a British sergeant. Wounded and presumed dead, he escapes and takes his revenge to the dark and paranoid streets of 1970s London.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.desc: In this episode Bren cooks up Caribbean inspired vegan delights. She kicks things off with sweet and spicy Mango Gazpacho. Then she roasts plantains and Cuban sweet potatoes with slaw and miso sauce.

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: Inspired by her travels to Italy, Bren lays out meals from the Amalfi coast. First its a limoncello spritzer, then a tomato based spicy seafood pasta with fresh herbs and crushed red peppers. She finishes up with a fresh tomato basil balsamic salad.

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, its savory and sweet and its also go big or go home. Bren seasons up and grills a gigantic tomahawk steak that juicy, tender and delicious. Then she makes a huge 4-layer carrot cake topped with homemade butter cream icing.

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: This episode Bren celebrates brunch Atlanta and DC style. She starts out with a lavender egg white martini. Then its Brens version of chicken and waffles with maple bourbon syrup.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: Jake and Jazz create the best vibe for this bedroom! Jake makes a custom headboard, and Jazz brings the charm with trendy accent pieces. The reveal meal is fried fish cakes, salad, and mango custard with whipped cream.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: Originally from the East Coast, Meghan is a millennial who tossed caution to the wind to pursue a new career in L.A.; Jake and Jazz take over Meghans studio apartment in Koreatown; Jazz redesigns her space and Jake builds her a custom headboard.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: Shay is a single mom who moved from the Midwest to Los Angeles with her young daughter; mommy duties are her first priority, so she has little time for redecorating; shes enlisted the help of Jake and Jazz to make her house feel more like a home.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: Jake and Jazz hit all the right notes when it comes to a redesign for music-lover Taylor; Jazz creates personalized vibes by adding cool colors and accent pieces, while Jake builds a unique coffee table to house Taylors record collection.

programme.desc: Its a new spin on surf and turf and Chef JJ is bringing it! He makes chopped chorizo and potato hash with pan seared brown butter scallops. Then its oxtail and lobster nachos topped with cheese and jalapenos.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Chef JJ makes 2 delicious curry meals. First he cooks up muscles and octopus in a coconut curry broth served with toasted French bread and then he makes a creamy and delicious shrimp korma served over rice.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Its all about Tapas and Cocktails, on the menu is a mixed berry white sangria served with spicy shrimp in a garlic sauce. Then its chorizo stuffed dates wrapped in bacon served with a lavender infused gin and tonic.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Chef JJ shows us some rice dishes that are great for the main meal and for dessert. On the menu is seafood paella with clams, mussels, shrimp and lobster. Then its sticky rice topped with coconut cream and mango sauce.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Its all about party food and Chef JJ gets the party started with Actress/ singer Danielle Summons. He makes mini turkey sliders, followed by honey BBQ wings, and a collard green dip that every party guests loves.
